product-info.opis: Mazilo vsebuje sestavine, ki kožo ščitijo in ji pomagajo pri njenem naravnem obnavljanju: mandljevo olje, ognjič, vitamin A in vitamin E.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua,Petrolatum, Lanolin, Prunus Amygdalus dulcis oil, Calendula officinalis extract, Cetearyl alcohol and Sodium lauryl sulphate and Sodium catearyl sulfate, Methylparaben, Parfum, Bisabolol, Allantoin, Tocopheryl acetate,Citric acid, Retinyl palmitate
